title: Venezuela's next generation's education is in jeopardy
text:
Venezuela's next generation's education is in jeopardy 02:16
Nearly 3 million children are missing some or all classes in Venezuela, according to a study, in a depressingknock-on from a deepening economic crisis that could cause long-lasting damage to the South American country.
